00052 inline void FeatureExtractorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00053 {
00054     totalTime_ = 0.0;
00055 
00056     if ( momentsComputingTime_.get() != 0 )

00060 inline void FeatureExtractorStatistics::momentsComputingTime (const double& elapsedTime)
